name: Psypuzzle unlimited Cube
description:
The Roguelike puzzle "Go! Psypuzzle" has been newly released as "Psy Unlimited Cube!".


You can challenge the difficulty level, which was only difficult, more easily by creating an unlimited cube. Enjoy story mode now and challenge the final barrier "Dimension of Freud".


Psy UnlimitedCube is a Roguelike puzzle genre, where you can enjoy the process of finding and overcoming the causes of socially problematic psychosis.


Basically, you have to incorporate Roguelike gameplay into the 3-match puzzle, and create many matches within a set time, which is a little different from the existing rules. Attack power, defense power, experience value, etc. differ depending on the combo of the match.


It has a Roguelike feature that everything is initialized when HP becomes 0 during the adventure, and if you utilize the cube, you can proceed with the adventure under better conditions.


You can install up to 4 cubes, and the more good cubes you install for each stat, the easier it will be to fight.


You can enjoy different stories from episode to episode, and get a lighter closer look at psychology.


Finally, the final challenge round supported by Freud is characterized by a high degree of difficulty, which can quickly end the adventure if not well prepared. If you complete such an adventure, you will have a great sense of accomplishment and you will be able to dominate the ranking confrontation.

Get on board the psychology-based "Psy Unlimited Cube!" and enjoy a new adventure you haven't experienced yet!


-- CONTACT US --
